dict.string: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `uid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `gold` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `ip` char(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0.0.0', `dev` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk on `user` (`name`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user_device` ( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `user_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `dev` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `ip` char(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0.0.0', `date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )

CREATE TABLE `user_setting` ( `uid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `bgm` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50, `se` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50, `guide` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `cguide` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 110101, `first` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `guidTxt` BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, `rmbShow` BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, `libao` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `firstlevel` BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, `auto` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
)
CREATE TABLE `user_guid` ( `gid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `cstep` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `tstep` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 )

CREATE TABLE `user_game` ( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `uid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `stage` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `score` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `time` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `useTimeItem` bool NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, `useRage` bool NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_game_uid` on `user_game` (`uid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_game_log` ( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `user_game_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `stage` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `score` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `time` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_game_uinque` on `user_game_log` (`user_game_id`, `stage`)
CREATE TABLE `lang` ( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `en-us` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `zh-cn` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE `tips` ( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `summary` text NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )

CREATE TABLE item( iid integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, summary text NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, level integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, price integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, space integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )

CREATE TABLE user_item( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, uid integer NOT NULL default 0, iid integer NOT NULL default 0, amount integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_item_unique` on `user_item` (`uid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE produce( produce_iid integer NOT NULL default 0, material_iid integer NOT NULL default 0, amount integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `produce_unique` on `produce` (`produce_iid`, `material_iid`)

CREATE TABLE user_product( uid integer NOT NULL default 0, iid integer NOT NULL default 0, mdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', cdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_product_unique` on `user_product` (`uid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE item_gather( `tool_iid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `gather_iid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `item_gather_unique` on `item_gather` (`tool_iid`, `gather_iid`)
CREATE TABLE item_mint( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE item_package( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE item_carriage( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE item_factory( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `time` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE item_drug( `iid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )

CREATE TABLE `talent`( `talent_id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `type` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "" )
CREATE TABLE `buff`( `buff_id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "" )

CREATE TABLE `talent_buff`( `talent_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `buff_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `value` float NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `talent_buff_unique` on `talent_buff` (`talent_id`, `buff_id`)

CREATE TABLE user_talent( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `talent_id` integer NOT NULL default 0, `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_talent_unique` on `user_talent` (`uid`, `talent_id`)

CREATE TABLE achievement( `aid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `level` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `point` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `cid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `condition` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `type` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )

CREATE TABLE user_achievement ( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `aid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_achievement_unique` on `user_achievement` (`uid`, `aid`)
CREATE TABLE `counter`( `cid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "" )

CREATE TABLE `user_counter` ( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `cid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_counter_unique` on `user_counter` (`uid`, `cid`)
CREATE TABLE `building`( `bid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )
CREATE TABLE `worker`( `wid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `bid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )

CREATE TABLE worker_gain( `wid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `worker_gain_unique` on `worker_gain` (`wid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE user_worker( uid integer NOT NULL default 0, wid integer NOT NULL default 0, amount integer NOT NULL default 0, mdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', cdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_worker_unique` on `user_worker` (`uid`, `wid`)

CREATE TABLE user_build( uid integer NOT NULL default 0, bid integer NOT NULL default 0, amount integer NOT NULL default 0, mdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', cdate datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_build_unique` on `user_build` (`uid`, `bid`)
CREATE TABLE build( bid integer NOT NULL default 0, iid integer NOT NULL default 0, amount integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `build_unique` on `build` (`bid`, `iid`)
CREATE TABLE `user_gain` ( `uid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `gather_expire` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `gain_expire` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )

CREATE TABLE shop( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `price` integer NOT NULL default 0, `rmb` float NOT NULL default 0, `disposable` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `shop_unique` on `shop` (`fid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_shop`( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_shop_unique` on `user_shop` (`uid`, `fid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE `role` ( `rid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL default 0, `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default 0, `level` integer NOT NULL default 0, `life` integer NOT NULL default 0, `power` integer NOT NULL default 0, `speed` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `accuracy` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `skill` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `effect` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )
CREATE TABLE effect( `eid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `level` integer NOT NULL default 0, `value` float NOT NULL default "0.0" )
CREATE TABLE effect_type( `etid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL default 0, `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default 0 )

CREATE TABLE user_role( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `rid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0, `dead` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_role_unique` on `user_role` (`uid`, `rid`)

CREATE TABLE train( `rid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `origin_id` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `train_unique` on `train` (`rid`, `type`, `origin_id`)

CREATE TABLE `user_crusade`( `uid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `sid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `x` integer NOT NULL default 0, `y` integer NOT NULL default 0, `depart` integer NOT NULL default 0, `round` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )

CREATE TABLE `user_crusade_drop`( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_crusade_drop_unique` on `user_crusade_drop` (`uid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_crusade_package`( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_crusade_package_unique` on `user_crusade_package` (`uid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_crusade_carriage`( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `rid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_crusade_carriage_unique` on `user_crusade_carriage` (`uid`, `rid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_stage`( `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `sid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `nofog` integer NOT NULL default 0, `first` integer NOT NULL default 1, `cdate` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_stage_unique` on `user_stage` (`uid`, `sid`)

CREATE TABLE `stage`( `sid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `level` integer NOT NULL default 0, `width` integer NOT NULL default 0, `height` integer NOT NULL default 0, `encounter` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `encounter_increase` float NOT NULL default 0 )
CREATE TABLE `background`( `bgid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )

CREATE TABLE `field`( `fid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `monster` integer NOT NULL default 0, `img` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `message_enter` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `message_leave` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )
CREATE TABLE `field_key`( `fid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `num` integer NOT NULL default 0 )

CREATE TABLE `field_reward`( `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `field_reward_unique` on `field_reward` (`fid`, `iid`)

CREATE TABLE `field_monster`( `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `sequence` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `field_monster_unique` on `field_monster` (`fid`, `mid`,`sequence`)

CREATE TABLE `arena_monster`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `round` integer NOT NULL default 0, `blood` integer NOT NULL default 0, `power` integer NOT NULL default 0, `speed` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `accuracy` float NOT NULL default "0.0" )

CREATE TABLE `arena_reward`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `stage` integer NOT NULL default 0, `round` integer NOT NULL default 0, `blood` integer NOT NULL default 0, `power` integer NOT NULL default 0, `speed` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `accuracy` float NOT NULL default "0.0" )

CREATE TABLE `stage_field`( `sid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `monster` integer NOT NULL default 0, `coord_type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `x` integer NOT NULL default 0, `y` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0 )

CREATE TABLE `user_stage_map`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `sid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `bgid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `round` integer NOT NULL default 0, `visit` integer NOT NULL default -1, `fog` integer NOT NULL default 0, `x` integer NOT NULL default 0, `y` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_stage_map_unique` on `user_stage_map` (`uid`, `sid`, `x`, `y`)

CREATE TABLE `monster`( `mid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `blood` integer NOT NULL default 0, `power` integer NOT NULL default 0, `speed` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `accuracy` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `img` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `monster_unique` on `monster` (`mid`)

CREATE TABLE `monster_drop`( `mid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `amount` integer NOT NULL default 0, `rate` float NOT NULL default "0.0", `group` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `monster_drop_unique` on `monster_drop` (`mid`, `iid`)
CREATE TABLE `stage_monster`( `sid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mid` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `stage_monster_unique` on `stage_monster` (`sid`, `mid`)
CREATE TABLE `tavern`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `fid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `rid` integer NOT NULL default 0 );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `tavern_unique` on `tavern` (`fid`, `rid`)

CREATE TABLE `task`( `tid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `board` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `tips` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `multiple` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE `task_type`( `type` integer PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )
CREATE TABLE `task_button`( `tbid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "" )
CREATE TABLE `task_cause`( `tid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type_id` integer NOT NULL default 0 )
CREATE TABLE `task_condition`( `tid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type_id` integer NOT NULL default 0, `num` integer NOT NULL default 0 )
CREATE TABLE `task_result`( `tid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `type_id` integer NOT NULL default 0, `num` integer NOT NULL default 0 )

CREATE TABLE `task_sudden`( `tid` integer PRIMARY KEY, `type` integer NOT NULL default 0, `weight` integer NOT NULL default 0, `message` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `cue` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `iid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `num` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `rmb` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0' )

CREATE TABLE `user_task`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `uid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `tid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `complete` integer NOT NULL default 0, `date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_task_unique` on `user_task` (`tid`)
CREATE TABLE `user_button`( `btid` integer NOT NULL default 0, `mdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_btn_unique` on `user_button` (`btid`)

CREATE TABLE `chance`( `cid` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `board` varchar(200) NOT NULL default "", `group` integer NOT NULL default 0, `weight` integer NOT NULL default 0, `date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_event_unique` on `user_task` (`tid`)

CREATE TABLE `user_board`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `uid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `content` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `cdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )

CREATE TABLE `mall`( `mall_id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `summary` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `img` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT "", `multiple` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `iid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `cost` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `parent_mall_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 );CREATE INDEX `mall_index` on `mall` (`parent_mall_id`)

CREATE TABLE `user_mall`( `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `uid` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `mall_id` integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `cdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' );CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `user_mall_unique` on `user_mall` (`uid`, `mall_id`)
